page.title: 10Living In Rowney Green
page.content: Many people chose to live in Rowney Green because they liked the area. Most people worked in Birmingham so they liked to go home and relax after a hards days work. The village is set into open country-side. Most of the houses are large and expensive and they all have large gardens except for two. Some of the people were forced to move because of their jobs. Others came for a nice retirement in the country. The young people came with their parents to live in the village. One person moved there because the houses were cheaper when he was younger.
